name: Monster Truck Hill Stunt 3D
description:
Are you interested in monster truck hill climbing games?
So here comes the most thrilling, freestyle, endless and adventurous game. The most perfect game for kids. Best graphics and smooth physics different types of hill climb challenges and tracks. The game with the most unique game play with no gear shifting in sight just tap on the acceleration button and enjoy the endless adventurous hill and mud game, collect as many coins as you can and don’t forget to collect the fuel gallons. Make as many high scores as you can take screenshots and share it with other people on google play.
We bring you a stunning off road car game with realistic 3d environment full of fun and adventure. become an aspiring uphill driver or racer by driving super cool cars, trucks on vast mountains and different environment. It takes you to the endless racing genre to a whole new level. be a furious and crazy driver or racer on different hills so that you can perform illegal stunt actions without the police chasing you. get ready to drive all kinds of big jeep vehicles through the off road hills go easy on attractive offroad and sharp turns, you don't want to be falling down the cliff as you take on the bumpy & rugged terrain in the absolute stunning environment. Do you think it is easy to drive a monster truck? so check your off-road driving skills over a narrow rocky ridge in this brand new monster truck game.
Drive the most epic 4x4 extra power monster truck with real turbo sound and different environment, we will include more environments in future updates. Upgrade and buy new vehicles with the coins you collected different types of dangerous obstacles and downhill environments, zigzag hills that won't be easy to climb. To survive collect as many fuel gallons as you can. drive the truck with full concentration and patience in countryside, desert, etc. (in future). If you are not patient, then you are in danger to lose your precious life. Some cars will also come in your way, but don’t hesitate to jump over those small cars because you will get bonus points on jumping over them. So do you like to play around trucks? do you like to perform different types of stunts? Download it now for free on google play store. drive as quickly as you can so that you may not run out of fuel because fuel is the thing on which your whole game depends on.
Monster Truck Hill Stunt 3D Game Features
* Tap your phone/tablet on your right side for acceleration
* Tap on your phone/tablet on your left corner for brake, tilt and control your truck
-Realistic car physics
-Very beautiful eye-catching graphics
-Never ending hill climbing game with too much joy!
-Different engine upgrades in garage
-Endless stage with spectacular and various environments
-Tune-able parts including suspension, tires and 4wd

we hope that you will like this game and give us feedback about this game so that we can improve our game. thank you!
